Settings.Languages_PrimaryLanguageOverride_Descri: Utiliser une langue personnalisée pour substituer la langue système utilisée par l'application.
Settings.Languages_PrimaryLanguageOverride_Notice: Un redémarrage est requis pour appliquer les changements.
Settings.Storage_ClearCache_Description.Text: Effacer l'historique de cache, effacera tous les fichiers temporaires créés durant le processus et libérera du stockage local.
Settings.Storage_ClearCache_Notice.Text: Ceci n'affectera pas les fichiers déjà traités et sauvés à d'autres endroits.

Tools.IfcAnonymizer_Description: Anonimise les informations utilisateur ainsi que les informations produit spécifique. Simplifie la soumission de modèle dans le cadre d'appels d'offre ou de concours.
Tools.IfcConverter_Description: Converti simplement un IFC en OBJ(.obj), Collada(.dae), STEP(.stp), IGES(.igs), XML(.xml) et SVG(.svg).
Tools.IfcOptimizer_Description: Reduit la taille des fichiers IFC en optimisant les calques ressources et en éliminant les décalages de virgule flottante au travers de l'optimisation géométrique par arrondi (FPR geometric optimization).
Tools.IfcRelocator_Description: Relocalise l'IFC selon un système de coordonnée mondiale et de projet. Aligne l'origine de deux modèles.
Tools.IfcSplitter_Description: Scinde des IFC par type/conteneur (site, bâtiment, niveau) ou selon les objets sélectionnés dans la hiéarchie.
Tools.IfcValidator_Description: Valide la présence de propriétés de classification dans le fichier IFC. Propulsé par le buildingSMART Data Dictionary - bSDD OpenAPI.

UI.Anonymizer_AddRuleButton.Text: Add rule with selected object type

UIForm.Anonymizer_ProductInfoNoticeKeyword_Deta: Because the replacement process depends on the keywords and replacement words you choose, please choose keywords carefully. It is recommended not to choose keywords with less than 4 characters.
UIForm.Anonymizer_ProductInfoNoticeProp_Detail: The replacement of typed properties and instance properties is risky. Please check in advance whether the keyword exists in other important property sets.
UIForm.Anonymizer_ProductInfoOpen_Detail: When the 'Anonymize IfcProduct' option is enabled and the rule table is not empty, the element information is replaced according to the keyword replacement rule.
UIForm.Anonymizer_ProductInfoWarning_Detail: This process is not always guaranteed.
UIForm.Anonymizer_ProductInfo_Help: What information corresponds to the options?
UIForm.Anonymizer_StatementPurpose_Detail: IFC Anonymizer is made to simplify the model submission process in bidding activities or design competitions.
UIForm.Anonymizer_StatementResponsibility_Detai: Please make sure you understand that this app is available for free. This application is not responsible for your project.
UIForm.Anonymizer_StatementWarning_Detail: Do not use it for illegal and improper purposes.
UIForm.Anonymizer_UserInfoOpen_Detail: The anonymization process will remove the corresponding entities when it is turned on.
UIForm.Anonymizer_UserInfo_Help: Which entities should be deleted for model submission?
UIForm.Common_GeneralKeepLabel_Description: If ON will not reorder entity lable
UIForm.Converter_AddAutoElevation_Detail: Creates SVG elevation drawings automatically based on model extents.
UIForm.Converter_AddAutoSection_Detail: Creates SVG cross section drawings automatically based on model extents.
UIForm.Converter_AddBounds_Detail: Specifies the bounding rectangle to which the output will be scaled.
UIForm.Converter_AddBuildingLocalPlacement_Deta: Place elements locally in the IfcBuilding coordinate system, instead of placing them in the IFC global coords.
UIForm.Converter_AddConverterSectionHeightFromS: Derives section height from storey elevation.
UIForm.Converter_AddDoorArcs_Detail: Draw door openings arcs for IfcDoor elements.
UIForm.Converter_AddPrintSpaceAreas_Detail: Prints calculated IfcSpace areas in square meters. Only takes effect when IfcSpace is included in the filter.
UIForm.Converter_AddPrintSpaceNames_Detail: Prints IfcSpace LongName and Name in the geometry output. Only takes effect when IfcSpace is included in the filter.
UIForm.Converter_AddSiteLocalPlacement_Detail: Place elements locally in the IfcSite coordinate system, instead of placing them in the IFC global coords.
UIForm.Converter_AddSvgPoly_Detail: Uses the polygonal algorithm for hidden line rendering.
UIForm.Converter_AddSvgProject_Detail: Always enable hidden line rendering instead of only on elevations.
UIForm.Converter_AddSvgXmlns_Detail: Stores name and guid in a separate namespace as opposed to data-name, data-guid.
UIForm.Converter_AddUseElementGuids_Detail: Use entity instance IfcRoot.GlobalId instead of unique IDs for naming elements upon serialization.
UIForm.Converter_AddUseElementHierarchy_Detail: Order the elements using their IfcBuildingStorey parent.
UIForm.Converter_AddUseElementNames_Detail: Use entity instance IfcRoot.Name instead of unique IDs for naming elements upon serialization.
UIForm.Converter_AddUseElementNumericIds_Detail: Use the numeric step identifier (entity instance name) for naming elements upon serialization.
UIForm.Converter_AddUseElementTypes_Detail: Use element types instead of unique IDs for naming elements upon serialization.
UIForm.Converter_AddUseMaterialNames_Detail: Use material names instead of unique IDs for naming materials upon serialization.
UIForm.Converter_AddYUp_Detail: Change the 'up' axis to positive Y, default is Z UP.
UIForm.Converter_GeneralCenterModelGeometry_Det: Centers the elements by applying the center point of all mesh vertices as an offset.
UIForm.Converter_GeneralCenterModel_Detail: Centers the elements by applying the center point of all placements as an offset. Can take several minutes on large models.
UIForm.Converter_GeneralConvertBackUnits_Detail: Specifies whether to convert back geometrical output back to the unit of measure in which it is defined in the IFC file. Default is to use meters.
UIForm.Converter_GeneralDisableBooleanResults_D: Specifies whether to disable the boolean operation within representations such as clippings by means of IfcBooleanResult and subtypes.
UIForm.Converter_GeneralDisableOpeningSubtracti: Specifies whether to disable the boolean subtraction of IfcOpeningElement Representations from their RelatingElements.
UIForm.Converter_GeneralEnableLayersetSlicing_D: Specifies whether to enable the slicing of products according to their associated IfcMaterialLayerSet.
UIForm.Converter_GeneralLayersetFirst_Detail: Assigns the first layer material of the layerset to the complete product.
UIForm.Converter_GeneralModel_Detail: Specifies whether to include surfaces and solids in the output result. Typically these are representations of type Body or Facetation. Included by default.
UIForm.Converter_GeneralOrientShells_Detail: Specifies whether to orient the faces of IfcConnectedFaceSets. This is a potentially time consuming operation, but guarantees a consistent orientation of surface normals, even if the faces are not properly oriented in the IFC file.
UIForm.Converter_GeneralPlan_Detail: Specifies whether to include curves in the output result. Typically these are representations of type Plan or Axis. Excluded by default.
UIForm.Converter_GeneralUseWorldCoords_Detail: Specifies whether to apply the local placements of building elements directly to the coordinates of the representation mesh rather than to represent the local placement in the 4x3 matrix, which will in that case be the identity matrix.
UIForm.Converter_GeneralWeldVertices_Detail: Specifies whether vertices are welded, meaning that the coordinates vector will only contain unique xyz-triplets. This results in a manifold mesh which is useful for modelling applications, but might result in unwanted shading artefacts in rendering applications.
UIForm.Optimizer_FPRHelp: How FPR improve IFC file quality ?
UIForm.Optimizer_FPRPointList_Detail: Supported point list classes: IfcIndexedPolyCurve, IfcTessellatedFaceSet.
UIForm.Optimizer_FPRPoint_Detail: Supported point classes: IfcAxis2Placement2D, IfcAxis2Placement3D, IfcPolyline, IfcPolyLoop, IfcVertexPoint, IfcBoundingBox, IfcBSplineCurve, IfcBSplineSurface.
UIForm.Optimizer_FPRPrecision_Detail: Decimal places after the FPR process. 4 is the maximum optimization.
UIForm.Optimizer_MergeHelp: How merge redundancy process can be zero loss ?
UIForm.Optimizer_MergeOnlyResource_Detail: Resources layer entities present the basic IFC entities which do not reference other entities.
UIForm.Optimizer_MergeReversedEntities_Detail: Including all related entities of resources layer entities for the optimization process.
UIForm.Relocator_OptionsHelp: How to choose the right option ?
UIForm.Relocator_OptionsPCS_Detail: The relative position of the site to the origin of world coordinates.
UIForm.Relocator_OptionsWCS_Detail: The root position of the project, which represents the virtual starting point.
UIForm.Splitter_OptionSection_Description: Placeholder is used if the corresponding entity does not have a name. Only numbers and letters are allowed.
UIForm.Splitter_OptionsHelp: How to split IFC files by different methods ?
